{{Location Intro|The '''Roots of the Valley of Life''' ''(unofficial name)''|description=<p>The [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] "[[Seed from the Valley of Life]]" takes place here.</p>

<p>Climbing up the tree's branches on the southern side of the area allows the player to travel through a [[Mine Passageway]] to [[Sumeru]], near a [[Mushroom]] growing on the tree. The other side of the passageway is next to the waterfall beneath the [[Statue of The Seven]] near [[Gandharva Ville]] in [[Avidya Forest]].</p>}}
